commit.message:
GoReleaser: pre-compile linux & darwin arm64 binaries & docker images (#479)

* Update release.yml

* Update .goreleaser.yml

* Update release.yml

* Update release.yml

* cut linux

* cross compile only linux arm64

* use golang-cross-example-sysroot for linux-armhf

* use docker image to run goreleaser

* inline docker run

* escape -v and -e

* try

* remove gpg signing

* absolute /var/rin/docker

* gpgp and split darwin amd64 from arm64

* fix env

* remove epxlorer

* copy from container to host

* fix image

* /home/runner/work/osxcross/target/bin

* mkdir -p

* ls -la

* drop /bin

* add deps

* add in path aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc

* add sudo

* install gcc g++

* revert to plentico osxcross

* use qemu & docker manifest to build multi-arch image

* drop redundant goarch

* Dockerfile: let image inject GOARCH

* dockerfile: fix typo

* GOOS=${TARGETOS} & GOARCH=${TARGETARCH}

GoReleaser: pre-compile linux & darwin arm64 binaries & docker images (#479)

* Update release.yml

* Update .goreleaser.yml

* Update release.yml

* Update release.yml

* cut linux

* cross compile only linux arm64

* use golang-cross-example-sysroot for linux-armhf

* use docker image to run goreleaser

* inline docker run

* escape -v and -e

* try

* remove gpg signing

* absolute /var/rin/docker

* gpgp and split darwin amd64 from arm64

* fix env

* remove epxlorer

* copy from container to host

* fix image

* /home/runner/work/osxcross/target/bin

* mkdir -p

* ls -la

* drop /bin

* add deps
